querystring.select: SELECT AC.CUST_NAME AS CustName, RMG.DESCR AS GenderName, RMIT.DESCR + ' / ' + AC.ID_NO AS IdTypeAndIdNo, ACP.MOTHER_MAIDEN_NAME AS MotherMaidenName, AC.ID_EXPIRED_DT AS IdExpiredDt, RMMS.DESCR AS MaritalStatusName, ACP.BIRTH_PLACE + ' / ' + FORMAT(ACP.BIRTH_DT, 'dd-MMM-yyyy') AS BirthPlaceAndDate, RMN.DESCR AS NationalityName, AC.TAX_ID_NO AS TaxIdNo, ACP.MOBILE_PHN_NO_1 AS MobilePhnNo1, RME.DESCR AS EducationName, ACP.EMAIL_1 AS Email1, RMR.DESCR AS ReligionName, AC.IS_VIP AS IsVip, RC.COUNTRY_NAME AS CountryName
querystring.from: FROM dbo.APP_CUST AC WITH(NOLOCK) LEFT JOIN dbo.APP_CUST_PERSONAL ACP WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.APP_CUST_ID = ACP.APP_CUST_ID LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER RMG WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACP.MR_GENDER_CODE = RMG.MASTER_CODE AND RMG.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'GENDER' LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER RMIT WITH(NOLOCK) ON AC.MR_ID_TYPE_CODE = RMIT.MASTER_CODE AND RMIT.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'ID_TYPE' LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER RMMS WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACP.MR_MARITAL_STAT_CODE = RMMS.MASTER_CODE AND RMMS.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'MARITAL_STAT' LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER RMN WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACP.MR_NATIONALITY_CODE = RMN.MASTER_CODE AND RMN.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'NATIONALITY' LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER RME WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACP.MR_EDUCATION_CODE = RME.MASTER_CODE AND RME.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'EDUCATION' LEFT JOIN V_REF_MASTER RMR WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACP.MR_RELIGION_CODE = RMR.MASTER_CODE AND RMR.REF_MASTER_TYPE_CODE = 'RELIGION' LEFT JOIN V_REF_COUNTRY RC WITH(NOLOCK) ON ACP.NATIONALITY_COUNTRY_CODE = RC.COUNTRY_CODE
